0.text: Innate - Ancient Chimes: Bard's presence causes sacred  Chimes to appear at random locations on the map, lingering for up to 10 minutes. Collecting a Chime grants Bard  24% bonus movement speed out of combat for 7 seconds, stacking up to 5 times, with every other Chime collected beyond the first granting an additional 14% bonus movement speed, up to a total of 80% bonus movement speed,  20 + (1 per minute after 5 minutes) experience, and  12% maximum mana. Bard empowers his Meeps each time he collects 5 Chimes.
0.html: Innate - Ancient Chimes: Bard's presence causes sacred Chimes to appear at random locations on the map, lingering for up to 10 minutes. Collecting a Chime grants Bard  24% bonus movement speed out of combat for 7 seconds, stacking up to 5 times, with every other Chime collected beyond the first granting an additional 14% bonus movement speed, up to a total of 80% bonus movement speed,  20 + (1 per minute after 5 minutes) experience, and  12% maximum mana. Bard empowers his Meeps each time he collects 5 Chimes.
markedPassages: 24% bonus movement speed
20 + (1 per minute after 5 minutes) experience
12% maximum mana

1.text:
Innate - Meeps: Bard's presence attracts Meeps, which are small spirits that come to his side. While he has Meeps, his basic attacks are empowered to each consume a Meep on-attack to deal 35 (+ 14 per 5 Chimes collected) (+ 30% AP) bonus magic damage.
At 5 Chimes, Meeps  slow damaged enemies by 25% − 75% (based on number of Chimes) for 1 second.
At 15 Chimes, Meeps deal the damage to enemies within 150 units of the primary target as well as those in a cone behind them.
At 35 Chimes, the cone's radius increases.
1.html:
Innate - Meeps: Bard's presence attracts Meeps, which are small spirits that come to his side. While he has Meeps, his basic attacks are empowered to each consume a Meep on-attack to deal 35 (+ 14 per 5 Chimes collected) (+ 30% AP) bonus magic damage.

  • At 5 Chimes, Meeps slow damaged enemies by 25% − 75% (based on number of Chimes) for 1 second.
  • At 15 Chimes, Meeps deal the damage to enemies within 150 units of the primary target as well as those in a cone behind them.
  • At 35 Chimes, the cone's radius increases.
markedPassages: slow

2.text: Meeps spawn every 8 − 4 (based on number of Chimes) seconds and Bard can have up to 1 − 9 (based on number of Chimes) of them at a time.
2.html: Meeps spawn every 8 − 4 (based on number of Chimes) seconds and Bard can have up to 1 − 9 (based on number of Chimes) of them at a time.

0.text: Active: Bard fires an energy bolt in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them by 60% for a duration.
0.html: Active: Bard fires an energy bolt in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and slows them by 60% for a duration.
markedPassages: slows

1.text: After Cosmic Binding hits an enemy, the bolt continues behind them for 300 units. If the bolt hits terrain or a second enemy, it  stuns both targets for the same duration, dealing the same damage to the secondary target.
1.html: After Cosmic Binding hits an enemy, the bolt continues behind them for 300 units. If the bolt hits terrain or a second enemy, it stuns both targets for the same duration, dealing the same damage to the secondary target.
markedPassages: stuns

0.text: Active: Bard conjures a shrine at the target location that gathers power over 10 seconds, granting  sight of its surroundings for 1.8 seconds. Shrines last until they are consumed by champions moving over them. Up to 3 shrines may be active at a time.
0.html: Active: Bard conjures a shrine at the target location that gathers power over 10 seconds, granting sight of its surroundings for 1.8 seconds. Shrines last until they are consumed by champions moving over them. Up to 3 shrines may be active at a time.
markedPassages: sight

1.text: If the champion was an ally or Bard himself, they are  healed for an amount based on the shrine's power and gain  30% bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.
1.html: If the champion was an ally or Bard himself, they are healed for an amount based on the shrine's power and gain  30% bonus movement speed that decays over 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: healed
30% bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Bard opens a one-way magical corridor through a piece of terrain in the target direction for 10 seconds.
0.html: Active: Bard opens a one-way magical corridor through a piece of terrain in the target direction for 10 seconds.

1.text: A champion can  pass through the corridor by selecting it, becoming  revealed during the travel. Bard and allies travel through the portal at 33% increased speed.
1.html: A champion can pass through the corridor by selecting it, becoming revealed during the travel. Bard and allies travel through the portal at 33% increased speed.
markedPassages: pass
revealed

2.text: A nearby valid piece of terrain is required to cast this ability. Magical Journey cannot be taken while  immobilized or  grounded.
2.html: A nearby valid piece of terrain is required to cast this ability. Magical Journey cannot be taken while immobilized or grounded.
markedPassages: immobilized
grounded

0.text: Active: Bard sends magical energy arcing to the target location, granting  sight of the area during travel. Upon impact, it puts all units within into  stasis for 2.5 seconds, as well as  stunning all enemy  champions,  minions, and  turrets struck for the same duration. Enemies hit are  revealed for the duration.
0.html: Active: Bard sends magical energy arcing to the target location, granting sight of the area during travel. Upon impact, it puts all units within into stasis for 2.5 seconds, as well as stunning all enemy champions, minions, and turrets struck for the same duration. Enemies hit are revealed for the duration.
markedPassages: sight
stasis
stunning
champions
minions
turrets
revealed

1.text: Epic  monsters and  turrets are affected by Tempered Fate despite being  immune to crowd control.
1.html: Epic monsters and turrets are affected by Tempered Fate despite being immune to crowd control.
markedPassages: monsters
turrets
immune to crowd control

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Devotion: Grant allied champions within 850 radius a shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level), decaying over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – DEVOTION: Grant allied champions within  850 radius a  shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level), decaying over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Consecrate: Grant allied champions within 850 radius 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2 bonus resistances for this item's passive effect, Consecrate.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONSECRATE: Grant allied champions within 850 radius 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.

1.originHTML: +  +  300

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+300 health
+45 armor
+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Shipwrecker: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum each 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also slowed by 50% for 1 second.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SHIPWRECKER: While moving, generates 7 stacks of Momentum each 0.25 seconds, granting up to 40 bonus movement speed at 100 stacks after 3.75 seconds of moving. Momentum decays by 15 every 0.25 seconds while  immobilized. Basic attacks consume all stacks to deal 0 − 40 (based on Momentum) (+ 0% − 100% (based on Momentum) base AD) bonus physical damage on-hit. At maximum stacks, the target is also  slowed by 50% for 1 second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – PUFFCAP TOXIN: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Healing or  shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

Unique – Intervention: Call upon a beam of light to strike upon the target location after 2.5 seconds, granting sight of the area for the duration. (90 second cooldown; 5500 range).
